content:
{"name": "Church Women United Thrift Shop Emergency Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Required: Referral must be from a church, social worker, case manager, hospital, community clinic, or doctor's office on the agency's letterhead. Referral must be used within 24 hours or the next business
day. Call if the referral can't be used within that time limit.
May only use once every six months.
Required: Picture ID; Social Security cards (or birth certificates) for all household members", "email": "", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/CWUThriftShop/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "631 South Crissey Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Holland", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43528", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 41.6294783, "longitude": -83.7610364}, "phones": [{"number": "(419) 865-2300", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Referral required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social Security Card Required"}]}
